RIVAL RB1 ULTRA BAG GLOVES 2.0

$94.95

Color

  • black
  • REd
  • BLUE
  • WHITE

Size

  • S
  • M
  • L

Add to cart

The Rival RB1 Ultra Bag Gloves continue to use our unique and original hook and loop Wrist Lock for the absolute best in support and stability, as well as our ventilated mesh palm.

A Rival Original, the RB1 is still as relevant today as the day we invented it. From amateurs to pro’s, you can’t go wrong.

Features
  • Made of Hyper Resistant Microfibre;
  • High Density Multi-Layered Foam Padding;
  • Rival’s Unique and Original Wrist Lock Strap System;
  • Breathable Mesh Palm;
  • Soft, Foamy Cloth Inner Lining;
  • Printed and Embroidered Rival Graphics;
  • Rival Silicone Patch on the Strap.
WARNING
